SHIPPING FAQ + BUNKER CAM

Q: When will my order arrive?
A: Time is a construct that Y2K was supposed to destroy. We cannot guarantee linear delivery. Your package exists in a quantum state until observed by a postal worker.
Q: Can I return my kit?
A: You cannot return to the past. You cannot return the kit. These are related truths.
Q: Is the granola safe to eat?
A: Define "safe." Define "eat." The granola expired in 1999. So did certainty. We recommend treating it as a commemorative artifact, not a food source.
Q: Do you ship internationally?
A: Dread recognizes no borders. Yes, we ship internationally. Customs may flag "expired food items and dead electronics" but that's between you and your government.
Q: Where is Barnaby?
A: If we knew that, we wouldn't need this FAQ. Last credible sighting: a Linden Dollar exchange in 2007. We've stopped looking. He hasn't stopped hiding.
